p: The capability of prediction for the proposed model developed herein is dependent not only on the feature representation process but also on the selection of machine learning algorithms. This study exploited six popular and convenient ML algorithms, namely k-NN, rpart, glm, RF, XGB, and SVM, for discriminating AVPs from Non-AVPs. Previously, these ML algorithms have been extensively utilized in various domains [ 84, 85, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97, 98, 99]. In this study, the six ML algorithms were implemented using the caret package in the R software [ 100].
